content.question: Which of the following best explains how <math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> affected the reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> acts as a second buffer in the reaction.

<math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> acts as an additional carrier of electrons from photosystem <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="D C P I P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCPIP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
<math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> acts as an additional source of electrons to the light reaction of photosynthesis.

<math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> acts as an inhibitor to the movement of electrons within the light reaction of photosynthesis.

content.answer: <math alttext="D C M U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCMU</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> acts as an inhibitor to the movement of electrons within the light reaction of photosynthesis.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
